moveOne.name: Gourd Slam
moveOne.moveDescription: The Pumpkin character slams a giant gourd onto the opponent, causing substantial damage.

moveTwo.name: Jack-o'-Smash
moveTwo.moveDescription: The Pumpkin character transforms into a giant jack-o'-lantern and smashes into the opponent, dealing massive damage.

moveOne.name: Chemical Blast
moveOne.moveDescription: Unleash a powerful explosion of volatile chemicals.

moveTwo.moveDescription: Unleash a powerful attack using your latest invention.
